summary.span: 表示域对象的字段或属性与数据库表的列之间的映射。

span.span: Represents the mapping between a field or a property of a domain object into a column of a database table.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property DbType As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ DbType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取相应数据库列的类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type of the corresponding database column.

value.span: 以字符串表示的数据库列的类型。

span.span: The type of the database column as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将是用于在 TRANSACT-SQL 表声明命令中定义的列的确切文本。This will be the exact text used to define the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration command. 如果不是这样定义，数据库列类型被推断从成员类型。If not so defined, the database column type is inferred from the member type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsDbGenerated As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsDbGenerated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否由数据库自动生成。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is automatically generated by the database.

value.span: 如果此成员自动生成的数据库;否则为。

span.span: if this member is automatically generated by the database; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已自动生成的成员后会立即同步插入相应的数据行。Automatically generated members are synchronized immediately after the corresponding data row is inserted. 插入触发器生成的密钥，不支持的值。Insert trigger-generated key values are not supported.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member represents the inheritance discriminator.

value.span: 如果此成员表示继承鉴别器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member represents the inheritance discriminator; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以为`true`最多一个成员的最顶层的映射类层次结构中的。This property can be `true` for at most one member of the topmost mapped class in a hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPersistent As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否映射到列（或约束）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is mapped to a column (or constraint).

value.span: 如果此成员映射到列（或约束），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member is mapped to a column (or constraint); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可能具有持久性和非持久性成员的组合。A class may have a combination of persistent and non-persistent members. 永久成员映射而非永久成员未映射。Persistent members are mapped while non-persistent members are not mapped. 映射的类必须具有至少一个持久性成员。A mapped class must have at least one persistent member.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsPrimaryKey As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsPrimaryKey { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是否属于该类型的标识。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member is part of the type's identity.

value.span: 如果此成员是类型标识的一部分，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member is part of the type's identity; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`true`，类成员表示为表的唯一键的一部分的列。If this property is `true`, the class member represents a column that is part of the table's unique key. 多个类的成员可以将此属性设置为`true`是关联的列的复合键。More than one member of the class can have this property set to `true` for a key that is a composite of the associated columns. 实体类，至少一个成员必须具有此特性，并且应映射到的主键或唯一键对应的表或视图中。For an entity class, at least one member must have this attribute and should be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view. 否则，LINQ to SQL 会考虑以用于将更改提交到数据库以只读方式类的实例。Otherwise, LINQ to SQL considers instances of the class as read-only for the purpose of submitting changes to the database. 使用标识的列集不需要的主键。The set of columns identified with are not required to be the primary key. 它们只是表示唯一标识的实体集。They simply denote a set that uniquely identifies the entity. 常见的替代方法包括群集索引列或其他唯一键列。Common alternatives include clustering index columns or other unique key columns.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsVersion As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsVersion { bool get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示此成员是表示行版本还是时间戳。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that indicates whether this member represents the row version or timestamp.

value.span: 如果此成员表示行版本或时间戳，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this member represents the row version or timestamp; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本号将递增，并且每次更新时的相关的行更新时间戳列。Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated whenever the associated row is updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property UpdateCheck As UpdateCheck
public: abstract property System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck UpdateCheck { System::Data::Linq::Mapping::UpdateCheck get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取此成员的开放式并发检查策略。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the optimistic concurrency check policy for this member.

value.span: 一个枚举值，该值指示乐观并发检查策略的此成员。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates the optimistic concurrency check policy for this member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果类没有版本成员 (设置为`true`)，检测通过比较原始成员值与当前数据库状态。If the class does not have a version member ( set to `true`), detection is done by comparing original member values with the current database state. 属性确定 LINQ to SQL 如何实现在开放式并发冲突检测。The property determines how LINQ to SQL implements conflict detection under optimistic concurrency. 只有具有此属性的成员才能设置为或被视为在冲突检测过程。Only those members with this property set to or are considered during conflict detection.
